attr.title: Drilbert II Diggeredoo
attr.desc: Drilbert the Drill Boy is back! Help Drilbert fulfill his dream of drilling as deep as he can! A little puzzle game where you dig + push. Dig Deep; collect loot; get out.
attr.inst:
You can download Drilbert II Diggeredoo for free at: https://wheybags.itch.io/drilbert-ii-diggeredoo 

Download the Drilbert_II_Diggeredoo.zip version and extract it. Within the extracted files, there's a folder named linux with an assets.zip file; extract the contents of assets.zip into the port's gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md:
